columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaged item related to the packing unit and inner pack count information being added, updated, or removed.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaged unit.

columns.name: INNER_PACK_COUNT
columns.description: Count for the number of items in the inner pack. For example, case of soda inner pack six pack with count of four. The Inner Pack Count field gives you a place to enter how many of the item is packaged in this packaging unit. This information is for informational purposes only and will only be visible if you select Packaging Unit in the header section.
